snippet: A powerful storm that crippled much of the South moved up the East Coast and gathered in intensity just as people were heading to work, disrupting travel by road, rail and air.
abstract: Powerful storm system sweeps up the East Coast, leaving in its wake downed power lines, stranded travelers, abandoned vehicles and yet another mess of snow, slush and Ice; system settles over the New York region and quickly intensifies, creating blizzardlike conditions.
lead_paragraph: A powerful storm that crippled much of the South moved up the East Coast and gathered in intensity just as people were heading to work, disrupting travel by road, rail and air.

headline.main: Winter Offensive Takes Toll on East Coast
headline.print_headline: Weather Offensive on East Coast Takes an All-Too-Familiar Toll
